task.summary: Default task
Initial commit.
Created a wrapper class - MP3 song. It holds meta data and underlying Media class.

Remade broadcaster singleton. However it is not yet functional. Added factory loading in that singleton. Added population job in PlayerData. Finished PlayerData. Divided network and graphical observers. Added codes

First workable version of MeteorPlayer 2019!!! - Fixed null pointer issues in MP3Song - Removed unnecessary lists from PlayerData. PlayerData now holds observable lists in which data is loaded. - PlayerDisplay in return holds list views whose backing models are observable lists from PlayerData - Tested next/previous buttons and dobule clicking feature. Works fine - Added open command and open menu. - Added matrix.css
Song meta-data display is now functional. Added play button functionality Removed old commented code in PlayerData
Added dynamic search, observers for search and observers for text change. Search is not yet functional. Cleaned some code.
Dynamic search now works. Dynamic search now also works as intended.
Refactored documentation on observers. Added checkbox for toggling random playing sequence
Tested feature for playing random songs. It didn't work correctly, and it does now. Tested changing between random and non random mode mid playing. Works as intended.
Changed the return value of a job which opens songs. Previously it returned void, now it returns list of all loaded songs. This will be used for broadcasting of names of songs which were loaded.
Adjusted error recovery in search bar.
Added Codes class in package model. These codes describe change which occurred to network broadcaster.

Added skeletons for communication codes. Added codes.txt file so generic factory can load those codes and instance them. Player data has a new member - most recent load -> used for extra information on additional songs are opened to send only those songs.
Seperated commands which operate on model and those which just operate on scene. Tested them out, working as intended.
Added a method to enqueue a song in model.
Added network start command, network menu and shortcut for starting it.

Started implementing networking feature. Client can connect with an app but currently no data is transmitted. This version has no functional networking.
Refactored some code in ListBroadcaster: - Generic factory for loading codes is now a separate method. - Exception catching(when starting server) is now handled properly. Client will be warned with an alert window!
When creating wrapping client's socket's I/O streams they are now wrapped with UTF-8 decoding.
ListBroadcaster no longer receives subject through a method. Now it has a reference to concrete subject.
Small hotfix for method name in ICommunicationCode.
Small hotfix for ICommunicationCode methods.

Fixed part where network broadcaster was not registered as observer on player data.
Opening of songs currently crashes app. Also no more than 2 users can be connected.

ServerQueueListCode now works differently. It will now send list in format of (song, who queued it).
This reflection is applied in meteor remote app.
Added getters for 2 fields (current song and its' index) in PlayerData.

Major refactoring: - Removed ICommunicationCode. It is now replaced by two interfaces IServerCode and IClientCode.
- IServerCode are types of code which server initiates: - opening of songs - change of currently played song - change in a queue.
These type of codes require only to write to clients.
- IClientCode are types of code in which client sends a request, server does the job and then notifies everyone who is connected.
To reflect these changes, generic factory/api reflection loading method in ListBroadcaster was changed. It will now read separate codes from servercodes.txt and clientcodes.txt
Changed servercodes.txt and clientcodes.txt App can now be run properly

MESSAGE.value: Remade broadcaster singleton. However it is not yet functional. Added factory loading in that singleton. Added population job in PlayerData. Finished PlayerData. Divided network and graphical observers. Added codes

First workable version of MeteorPlayer 2019!!! - Fixed null pointer issues in MP3Song - Removed unnecessary lists from PlayerData. PlayerData now holds observable lists in which data is loaded. - PlayerDisplay in return holds list views whose backing models are observable lists from PlayerData - Tested next/previous buttons and dobule clicking feature. Works fine - Added open command and open menu. - Added matrix.css
Added SongInformation display. Currently not functional. Horror.
Song meta-data display is now functional. Added play button functionality Removed old commented code in PlayerData
Added dynamic search, observers for search and observers for text change. Search is not yet functional. Cleaned some code.
Dynamic search now works. Dynamic search now also works as intended.
Added skin switching: - Ctrl+l -> light skin - Ctrl+d -> superior matrix skin
Refactored documentation on observers. Added checkbox for toggling random playing sequence
Tested feature for playing random songs. It didn't work correctly, and it does now. Tested changing between random and non random mode mid playing. Works as intended.
Changed the return value of a job which opens songs. Previously it returned void, now it returns list of all loaded songs. This will be used for broadcasting of names of songs which were loaded.
Adjusted error recovery in search bar.
Added Codes class in package model. These codes describe change which occurred to network broadcaster.

Added skeletons for communication codes. Added codes.txt file so generic factory can load those codes and instance them. Player data has a new member - most recent load -> used for extra information on additional songs are opened to send only those songs.
Seperated commands which operate on model and those which just operate on scene. Tested them out, working as intended.
Added a method to enqueue a song in model.
Added network start command, network menu and shortcut for starting it.

Started implementing networking feature. Client can connect with an app but currently no data is transmitted. This version has no functional networking.
Refactored some code in ListBroadcaster: - Generic factory for loading codes is now a separate method. - Exception catching(when starting server) is now handled properly. Client will be warned with an alert window!
When creating wrapping client's socket's I/O streams they are now wrapped with UTF-8 decoding.
ListBroadcaster no longer receives subject through a method. Now it has a reference to concrete subject.
Small hotfix for method name in ICommunicationCode.
Small hotfix for ICommunicationCode methods.

Fixed part where network broadcaster was not registered as observer on player data.
Opening of songs currently crashes app. Also no more than 2 users can be connected.

ServerQueueListCode now works differently. It will now send list in format of (song, who queued it).
This reflection is applied in meteor remote app.
Added getters for 2 fields (current song and its' index) in PlayerData.

Major refactoring: - Removed ICommunicationCode. It is now replaced by two interfaces IServerCode and IClientCode.
- IServerCode are types of code which server initiates: - opening of songs - change of currently played song - change in a queue.
These type of codes require only to write to clients.
- IClientCode are types of code in which client sends a request, server does the job and then notifies everyone who is connected.
To reflect these changes, generic factory/api reflection loading method in ListBroadcaster was changed. It will now read separate codes from servercodes.txt and clientcodes.txt
Changed servercodes.txt and clientcodes.txt App can now be run properly

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: Changed servercodes.txt and clientcodes.txt App can now be run properly
